35 TEST(PlaybackTest, StopPlayback)
36 {
37  BlackBoxNode bbn;
38  vector<string> systemCalls;
39  bbn.p_system = [&](const char *cmd) {
40  systemCalls.push_back(cmd);
41  return 0;
42  };
43 
44  Playback::Request req;
45  Playback::Response res;
46 
47  req.play = false;
48 
49  bbn.playback_(req, res);
50 
51  EXPECT_EQ("killall rosbag", systemCalls.at(0));
52  EXPECT_EQ("pkill -f time_publisher.sh", systemCalls.at(1));
53  EXPECT_EQ(systemCalls.size(), 2);
54 }
55 
57 TEST(PlaybackTest, StartPlayback)
58 {
59  BlackBoxNode bbn;
60  vector<string> systemCalls;
61  bbn.p_system = [&](const char *cmd) {
62  systemCalls.push_back(cmd);
63  return 0;
64  };
65 
66  Playback::Request req;
67  Playback::Response res;
68 
69  req.play = true;
70  req.pos = 5;
71 
72  bbn.playback_(req, res);
73 
74  EXPECT_EQ("killall rosbag", systemCalls.at(0));
75  EXPECT_EQ("pkill -f time_publisher.sh", systemCalls.at(1));
76  EXPECT_EQ("roslaunch blackbox_control rosbag.launch BAGS:=" + bbn.getFilePath("bags") + "/* START_POS:=5 &", systemCalls.at(2));
77  EXPECT_EQ(systemCalls.size(), 3);
78 }

81 TEST(GetFilesTest, ReturnsListOfFiles)
82 {
83  BlackBoxNode bbn;
84  vector<string> files = bbn.getFiles("/");
85  EXPECT_GT(files.size(), 1);
86  // check the ordering
87  for (uint i = 1; i < files.size(); i++)
88  EXPECT_GT(files.at(i), files.at(i - 1));
89 }

93 {
94  BlackBoxNode bbn;
95 
96  EXPECT_EQ(1511543503, bbn.parseDate("bb_2017-11-24-18-11-43.bag"));

102 TEST(ExportFileName, GeneratesCorrectName)
103 {
104  BlackBoxNode bbn;
105  int t = 25;
106  bbn.p_time = [&](void) { return t; };
107  EXPECT_EQ("black_box_export_25.zip", bbn.exportFileName());
108  t = 5435;
109  EXPECT_EQ("black_box_export_5435.zip", bbn.exportFileName());
110  t = 65423;
111  EXPECT_EQ("black_box_export_65423.zip", bbn.exportFileName());
112 }

115 TEST(Export, ExportsFiles)
116 {
117  BlackBoxNode bbn;
118  string systemCall = "";
119  bbn.p_system = [&](const char *cmd) {
120  systemCall = cmd;
121  return 0;
122  };
123  bbn.p_get_files = [&](string path) {
124  vector<string> result;
125  for (int i = 10; i < 60; i++)
126  result.push_back("bb_2017-11-24-18-11-" + PrintToString(i) + ".bag");
127 
128  return result;
129  };
130 
131  int t = 99;
132  bbn.p_time = [&](void) { return t; };
133 
134  Export::Request req;
135  Export::Response res;
136 
137  int count = 8;
138  req.begin = 1511543503;
139  req.end = req.begin + count;
140  bbn.export_(req, res);
141 
142  int baseLength = home_dir.size() + 108;
143  int itemLength = 27;
144  EXPECT_EQ(baseLength + itemLength * count, systemCall.length());
145  EXPECT_EQ("black_box_export_99.zip", res.file_name);
146 
147  count = 10;
148  req.end = req.begin + count;
149  bbn.export_(req, res);
150 
151  EXPECT_EQ(baseLength + itemLength * count, systemCall.length());
152 }

155 TEST(Import, ImportsFiles)
156 {
157  BlackBoxNode bbn;
158  string systemCall = "";
159  bbn.p_system = [&](const char *cmd) {
160  systemCall = cmd;
161  return 0;
162  };
163  Import::Request req;
164  Import::Response res;
165  bbn.import_(req, res);
166  EXPECT_NE(systemCall.length(), 0);
167 }

170 TEST(AvailableRange, ReturnsAvailableRange)
171 {
172  BlackBoxNode bbn;
173  bbn.p_get_files = [&](string path) {
174  vector<string> result;
175  for (int i = 10; i < 60; i++)
176  result.push_back("bb_2017-11-24-18-11-" + PrintToString(i) + ".bag");
177

179  };
180 
181  GetAvailableRange::Request req;
182  GetAvailableRange::Response res;
183 
184  bbn.getAvailableRange_(req, res);
185 
186  EXPECT_EQ(1511543470, res.begin);
187  EXPECT_EQ(1511543519, res.end);

191 TEST(Advertise, AdvertisesServices)
192 {
193  BlackBoxNode bbn;
194  std::shared_ptr<RosProxyFake> p_rpf(new RosProxyFake);
195  bbn.init(p_rpf);
196  EXPECT_EQ(4, p_rpf->advertisedServices.size());
197  EXPECT_TRUE(std::find(p_rpf->advertisedServices.begin(), p_rpf->advertisedServices.end(), "/black_box/import") != p_rpf->advertisedServices.end());
198  EXPECT_TRUE(std::find(p_rpf->advertisedServices.begin(), p_rpf->advertisedServices.end(), "/black_box/export") != p_rpf->advertisedServices.end());
199  EXPECT_TRUE(std::find(p_rpf->advertisedServices.begin(), p_rpf->advertisedServices.end(), "/black_box/playback") != p_rpf->advertisedServices.end());
200  EXPECT_TRUE(std::find(p_rpf->advertisedServices.begin(), p_rpf->advertisedServices.end(), "/black_box/get_available_range") != p_rpf->advertisedServices.end());
201 }
